response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $12,000 to us due to its unique features and high-quality craftsmanship. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I would like to extend this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $10,000. This is an exceptional value, considering the product's actual worth to you is estimated at $8,000. I believe this offer provides a great balance between affordability and acquiring a valuable asset. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 10000}
